name: CUYHIC (click until your heart is content)
name_original: CUYHIC (click until your heart is content)
description:
This little game is just a cool functionality that wasn't used in another project. So it became a very relaxing mosaic creator. Just for fun I added physics so you can see it fall apart.

What you can do

Subdivide the figures as much as you want by clicking on it. You can also click on the black box at the bottom to see the structure fall apart.

Every try will be different! Use the Restart button as many times as you want.

How is it done

This is all done using Splines and polygon colliders. Every time a figure is divided a new vertice (sometimes 2) is created and the points passed to a method that assigns these to both Components. 

Half of what happens is on players choices (where they click). The other half (color, subdivision sides in certain cases) is randomized.

If you liked it

Relax, enjoy and if you like it, leave a comment, a dollar or a "hi!" at @ossetegames. And why not, share your creations :)
